content:
The flight deck and the Unconditional Surrender Statue are both iconic spots that will make for some fantastic photos. And don't forget to capture the beautiful views of the San Diego Bay and the city skyline while you're there!

And, of course, your lunch at The Fish Market or Anthony's Fish Grotto will be a great opportunity to take some mouth-watering foodie photos. Be sure to capture the presentation, the colors, and the details of your dish. You can even use some fun props like a fish-shaped plate or a nautical-themed napkin ring to add some personality to your photos.

Remember to have fun and be creative with your photos! Experiment with different angles, lighting, and compositions to make your photos stand out. And don't forget to use relevant hashtags to share your experience with your followers.

If you need any more tips or recommendations, feel free to ask. I'm always here to help. Have a fantastic time at the USS Midway Museum and enjoy your lunch at one of the great seafood restaurants in San Diego!
